entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sachs Harbour Airport 09:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -33.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -37.5°C
Wind: NNE 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 31.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 40 km/h becoming north 20 this morning. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 06:13 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
